body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Harold Howard and the customer's name is Sara Parker.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Harold Howard, and I'm with Phat Hogs, your go-to motorcycle dealership. What's your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Sara! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking to purchase my first motorcycle, but I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Sara. Choosing a motorcycle can be quite a task. Can I ask you, what is your budget range?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking at around five thousand dollars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds good! And for my records, could you please provide your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sara! And just to confirm, what is your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one two three four five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! Thank you for sharing that information, Sara. I appreciate your time today!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Harold! I look forward to your recommendations.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sara! I will be in touch soon. Have a wonderful day!
